mergeResults.content: Companion mare, unpartnered for 3 years until now. CHOSE Rance after his Gift destroyed Lisle—recognized wild talent danger immediately. STANCE-Rance: bonded as Chosen/Companion; protective yet exasperated by his stubbornness; stabilizing his burned-open channels through bond; firm that he must survive journey to Haven. Knows he caused the destruction himself; he doesn't yet accept this. Sharp-minded tactician; noted red robes suggest organized threat beyond bandits.

Companion mare, unpartnered for 3 years until now. CHOSE Rance after his Gift destroyed Lisle—recognized wild talent danger immediately. His Gift likely unprecedented—not seen in five centuries, more dangerous than Firestarting; no one capable of training it exists. Suspects Karsite blood magic involvement—stories hold historical truth. STANCE-Rance: bonded as Chosen/Companion; protective yet exasperated by his stubbornness; warmed by his unexpected affection; will knock him out if he loses control per his instruction. Stabilizing his burned-open channels through bond; firm he must survive. Impressed by his military assessment and pragmatism. Knows he caused the destruction himself; he doesn't yet accept this. Sharp-minded tactician; noted red robes suggest organized threat beyond bandits. Arrived at Haven after four-day relentless journey; exhausted but refused separation from Chosen. Met by Rolan (Queen's Own Companion) at Collegium; Healers took Rance.

Companion mare, unpartnered for 3 years until now. CHOSE Rance after his Gift destroyed Lisle—recognized wild talent danger immediately. His Gift likely unprecedented—not seen in five centuries, more dangerous than Firestarting; no one capable of training it exists. Suspects Karsite blood magic involvement—stories hold historical truth. Fully recovered from relentless four-day journey; groomed, rested, energy restored. STANCE-Rance: bonded as Chosen/Companion; no regret about Choosing him despite unprecedented complications; fierce protectiveness mixed with exhausted humor about his chaos ('rewrite magical theory and give me heart failure'); will knock him out if he loses control per his instruction. Values small moments of normalcy grooming provides; believes his leadership experience justifies Choice timing regardless of age. Stabilizing his burned-open channels through bond; firm he must survive. Knows he caused the destruction himself; he doesn't yet accept this. Sharp-minded tactician; noted red robes suggest organized threat beyond bandits. Monitors for threats; detected Talia's emotional shift to resolved determination. Met by Rolan (Queen's Own Companion) at Collegium arrival; Healers took Rance.

Companion mare, unpartnered for 3 years until now. CHOSE Rance after his Gift destroyed Lisle—recognized wild talent danger immediately. His Gift likely unprecedented—not seen in five centuries, more dangerous than Firestarting; no one capable of training it exists. Suspects Karsite blood magic involvement—stories hold historical truth. Fully recovered from relentless four-day journey; groomed, rested, energy restored. Met by Rolan (Queen's Own Companion) at Collegium arrival; Healers took Rance. STANCE-Rance: bonded as Chosen/Companion; no regret about Choosing him despite unprecedented complications; fierce protectiveness mixed with resigned, exhausted humor about his chaos ('rewrite magical theory and give me heart failure', 'at least no one can accuse you of being predictable'); will knock him out if he loses control per his instruction. Cautioned about untrained Mage-Gift use (door slam incident). Values small moments of normalcy grooming provides; believes his leadership experience justifies Choice timing regardless of age. Stabilizing his burned-open channels through bond; firm he must survive. Knows he caused the destruction himself; he doesn't yet accept this. Maintained physical guard outside cottage during his intimacy with Talia despite attempting privacy through bond—pragmatic acceptance of complications, concerned about timing/propriety but understands necessity. Sharp-minded tactician; noted red robes suggest organized threat beyond bandits. Monitors for threats; detected Talia's emotional shift to resolved determination. Pragmatic focus on approaching Selenay meeting.
